resources.name: react-native
resources.description: React Native CLI bare workflow, native modules, TypeScript, and platform-specific code for apps requiring native customization

resources.name: react-native-expo
resources.description: React Native + Expo managed workflow, Expo Router, TypeScript, and mobile best practices for rapid mobile development

resources.name: react-native-best-practices
resources.description: Provides React Native performance optimization guidelines for FPS, TTI, bundle size, memory leaks, re-renders, and animations. Applies to tasks involving Hermes optimization, JS thread blocking, bridge overhead, FlashList, native modules, or debugging jank and frame drops.

resources.name: github
resources.description: GitHub patterns using gh CLI for pull requests, stacked PRs, code review, branching strategies, and repository automation. Use when working with GitHub PRs, merging strategies, or repository management tasks.

resources.name: web-design-guidelines
resources.description: Review UI code for Web Interface Guidelines compliance. Use when asked to "review my UI", "check accessibility", "audit design", "review UX", or "check my site against best practices".

resources.name: vercel-composition-patterns
resources.description: React composition patterns that scale. Use when refactoring components with boolean prop proliferation, building flexible component libraries, or designing reusable APIs. Triggers on tasks involving compound components, render props, context providers, or component architecture. Includes React 19 API changes.

resources.name: vercel-react-best-practices
resources.description: React and Next.js performance optimization guidelines from Vercel Engineering. This skill should be used when writing, reviewing, or refactoring React/Next.js code to ensure optimal performance patterns. Triggers on tasks involving React components, Next.js pages, data fetching, bundle optimization, or performance improvements.

resources.name: vercel-react-native-skills
resources.description: React Native and Expo best practices for building performant mobile apps. Use when building React Native components, optimizing list performance, implementing animations, or working with native modules. Triggers on tasks involving React Native, Expo, mobile performance, or native platform APIs.

resources.name: figma-make-website-builder
resources.description: Structured 9-phase workflow for building production-ready websites using Claude (architecture, logic, reasoning) paired with Figma Make (UI, interactions, deployment). Covers architecture, design systems, content, component logic, prompt engineering, animation, responsive design, data integration, and QA.

resources.name: zvec
resources.description: Zvec vector database development — collection management, vector similarity search, schema design, embedding functions, indexing strategies (Flat, HNSW, IVF), and query optimization

resources.name: pgvector
resources.description: pgvector — open-source vector similarity search for Postgres. HNSW and IVFFlat indexing, half-precision/binary/sparse vectors, filtering, hybrid search, and performance tuning

resources.name: chrome-devtools
resources.description: Chrome DevTools via MCP for browser automation, debugging, performance analysis, network inspection, and accessibility testing. Use when debugging web pages, automating browser interactions, analyzing performance, or auditing accessibility.

resources.name: github-actions
resources.description: GitHub Actions CI/CD best practices — workflow structure, security, caching, matrix strategies, testing, deployment strategies, rollback, and troubleshooting

resources.name: mobile-app-distribution
resources.description: Mobile app distribution for iOS App Store and Google Play Store — React Native signing, building, publishing, Apple review guidelines, and pre-submission checklists
